DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of the study is to assess to which degree a series of sperm parameters known to be associated with fertilization and implantation potential in artificial reproductive technology (ART) differ in consecutive sperm samples produced after 2-7 days and 2 hours of sexual abstinence in males from couples referring for ART treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Sperm Quality in Consecutive Sperm Samples After 4-7 Days and 2 Hours of Sexual Abstinence
DOC.criteria: male age between 18 and 50 able to understand and read Danish complete azospermia significant psychological illness significant cardiovascular disease
